robot_capabilities.lerobot: A robotic arm with 5 DOF. It has a gripper (end effector) to hold items. The robot can pick and place the objects.
robot_capabilities.burger: A mobile robot with 2 Wheel Drive, can move on 2D plane, can goto specific location, can find objects in its vicinity (within 1 meter radius), cannot pick and place objects.

robot_morphology.lerobot: Payload: 500 g, Reach: 0.4 m, Degrees of Freedom: 5
robot_morphology.burger: Payload: ~8 kg (max ~12 kg), Speed: 0 ~ 3.7 m/s (max ~5 m/s), Weight: 15kg, Size: 700 x 310 x 400 mm
